functions.tag: {pages:['[["Report of the Mangrove Caves:\\n            ۩\\nIn the realm of untamed nature, an awe-inspiring dungeon lay concealed beneath the majestic mountain—a needle-like peak that seemed to pierce the very heavens. It was a sight that left me spellbound, beckoning"]]','[["me with an irresistible allure to explore its hidden depths.\\nAt the mountain\'s base, I discovered an entrance, its features weathered and worn by the relentless forces of nature. A portal into the unknown, leading into the belly of a vast and mysterious cave system. My heart"]]','[["quickened with excitement as I ventured forth, driven by an insatiable curiosity to uncover the enigmas that awaited within.\\nYet, my journey was not without challenges. In the darkness, lurking within the shadows, skeletal guardians stood"]]','[["sentinel, warning intruders like me to proceed with caution. Their presence added an air of mystery and foreboding to the labyrinthine passageways.\\nAs I delved deeper, a powerful resonance echoed from the depths—a low rumble that seemed to"]]','[["resonate through the very earth itself. It was a sound both ominous and intriguing, leaving me to wonder about the secrets concealed below.\\nRegrettably, the time for further exploration was not yet right, and I reluctantly departed from the caves. However,"]]','[["the memory of the dungeon\'s allure and the mysteries hidden within remained etched in my mind, fueling a desire to return one day—to conquer the uncharted depths and unravel the enigmatic secrets that lay within the heart of the mountain."]]'],title:"Bones and Bricks",author:"curious wanderer",generation:1,display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Bones and Bricks","italic":false,"color":"#cccccc"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Explore the antique ruins of","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','["",{"text":"an old civilization.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']}}
